page1.title: Welcome to Ice
page1.description: [[:ice]] is a digital currency that you can earn with your phone. Ice is owned and operated by every day users like yourself.

page2.title: Planet Friendly
page2.description: [[:ice]] is inherently more energy efficient than BTC as it uses a ‚ÄúProof of Stake‚Äù consensus mechanism. With proof-of-stake (POS), cryptocurrency owners validate block transactions based on the number of coins a validator stakes.

page3.title: People‚Äôs Coin
page3.description_part1: The power is in your hands.
page3.description_part2: Everything that we develop at [[:ice]] is open-source & controlled by the Decentralized Autonomous Organization (DAO).

page4.title: Stay Connected
page4.description: Tap [[:iceLogo]] for your daily check-in with our free, energy-light mobile app. Your daily tap ensures that Ice ends up in the hands of real humans, not bots.

page5.title: Refer & Earn
page5.description: Invite your friends and earn (both of you) up to 25% bonus on your base earning rate for each friend that joins your team.

page6.title: Notifications
page6.description_part1: [[:ice]] check-in sessions only last for 24 hours. Would you like to receive a notification when your current session ends?
page6.description_part2: Don‚Äôt worry, we will not spam you!

invite_friend.title: Invite Friends
invite_friend.description: Earn extra [[:ice]] by inviting your friends.

whoInvitedYou.dontHaveCodeTip: If you don't have an invitation code we will select a random member as your referral!

errors.multiple_accounts: Email/phone number is associated with another account. Please log into that account to prove ownership, then logout and log back into this one. If you do not own that other account or are unable to log into it, please contact our support.

errors.invalid_credential: The credentials are malformed or have expired.
errors.operation_not_allowed: The type of account corresponding to the credentials is not enabled.
errors.user_not_found_for_email: There is no user corresponding to the given email.
errors.google_play_services_not_available: Google Play services are not available on this device.
errors.no_such_provider: You do not have this provider linked.
errors.code_expired: The code has expired, please ask for a new code.

errors.unknown_error: An error occurred, please try again later.
errors.general_error_message: Looks like something went wrong. Our team is working on fixing it right now.
errors.general_network_error: A network error has occurred, please check your connection.
errors.credential_already_in_use: These credentials are already associated with a different user account.
errors.email_already_in_use: The email address is already in use by another account.
errors.user_token_expired: Your credentials are no longer valid, please sign in again.
errors.requires_recent_login: This operation is sensitive and requires recent authentication. Please sign in again.
errors.same_email: You can‚Äôt use the same e-mail.
errors.same_phone_error: You can‚Äôt use the same number.

staking.terms_agree: I agree to the [[:ice]] [[:link]]Staking Terms[[/:link]]. Your Ice holdings will be locked for the selected period.

pop_up.up_to_date_text: You are now using the latest version. Check all the changes below.
pop_up.resurrection_message: You have a one time chance to resurrect and receive [[:amount]] coins you have lost in the past [[:period]].
pop_up.resurrection_warning: You can only resurrect one time!
pop_up.resurrection_no_confirm_message: You will lose your [[:amount]] coins forever. Are you sure you want to continue?
pop_up.resurrection_yes_confirm_message: You can only resurrect one time! Are you sure you want to continue? The [[:amount]] coins will return to your balance within the next hour.
pop_up.delete_account_confirmation_text: Deleting your account will permanently erase all your data, including your Ice balance. Do you want to proceed?
pop_up.registration_update_text: We have suspended the creation of new accounts using the phone number. To continue, you will need to choose either an email address or a login in a social network.
pop_up.link_email_text: We have suspended the login using the phone number. Please link your email address and confirm it in order to be able to login.
pop_up.account_error_text: We have suspended the login using the phone number. Unfortunately your account did not pass KYC and is not eligible for recovery.
pop_up.login_via_email_text: We have suspended the login using the phone number. Please use the email associated to your account in order to be able to login.
pop_up.successfully_linked_text: The email has been successfully linked to your account.
pop_up.email_in_use_text_part1: The email address you're trying to link is already in use.
pop_up.email_in_use_text_part2: If this is your email address, please first log in with it, finalize the registration process and delete that account to make the email available, then return to the login with phone number to complete the linking process.

ice_bonus.title: Welcome reward
ice_bonus.description: Congratulations, you have received your first [[:value]] [[:ice]] coins which proves our [[:bold]]Trust[[/:bold]] in [[:bold]]You[[/:bold]].

snowman.title: Snowman
snowman.subtitle: Build a snow empire
snowman.description: Earn by checking in every 24 hours to show your commitment to the Ice network and prove that you're a human, not a robot.

ambassador.title: Ambassador
ambassador.subtitle: Ruler of the snow empire
ambassador.description: You become an ambassador when at least 100 people joined your team. Every ambassador will get early access to new features.

confirm_phone.modify_description: Please confirm your country code and enter your phone number.

team.description: [[:ice]] is better with friends. On this page you can see the status of your team members. You can also ping them from here.

referralscard.title: Team card
referralscard.description: See the evolution of your team members stats for the previous 5 days by tapping this card.

segmented_control_tier_one.title: Team
segmented_control_tier_one.description: Here you can see the list of the people you have invited to join the Ice Network. You can easily track their status from here and send notifications to the inactive ones.

active_users.description: This is the current status of your team members check-in activity. They count as active when they have an active check-in session.

ping.description: Notify your team members to start their check-in sessions. You can send one notification to each referral every 24h.

hidden_data.title: Hidden data
hidden_data.description: Tap on the eye icon to view how other users see your profile.

readmore.title: Read more
readmore.description: Here you can see our latest news from our team. Tap on this button to read the full article.

releasednews.title: Released news
releasednews.description: Tap on each individual news title and read the full version of it. Stay up to date on all our news and polls.

allow_contacts.title: Allow contacts
allow_contacts.description: Sync your contacts and see who is already on [[:ice]]. In the future you will be able to send [[:ice]] to any of your contacts.

confirm_phone.title: Confirm phone
confirm_phone.description: Confirm your identity and allow your contacts to know that you are also a member of the Ice network. Your phone number will not be shared with other third parties.

contacts_list.title: List of contacts
contacts_list.description: This is the list with all your contacts, those who already joined the [[:ice]] network being displayed on top of the list.

referrals.title: Referrals
referrals.description: Here you will see how many referrals you have in total. The more people you invite, the more you will earn.

earnings.title: Earnings
earnings.description: Your current balance is updated every hour and displayed here. It includes your direct & staked earnings together with the Tier 1 and Tier 2 earnings.

segmented_control_tier_one.title: Tier 1
segmented_control_tier_one.description: Here you can see the list of your Tier 1 referrals. For each friend checking-in at the same time with you, you will get extra 25% on your base current adoption earning rate. [[:link]]Read more[[/:link]]

segmented_control_tier_two.title: Tier 2
segmented_control_tier_two.description: Here you can see the list of your Tier 2 referrals. For each friend checking-in at the same time with you, you will get extra 5% on your base current adoption earning rate. [[:link]]Read more[[/:link]]

active_users.title: Active Users
active_users.description: This is the current status of your referrals check-in activity. They count as active when they have an active check-in session.

tier_one_earnings.title: Tier 1 Earnings
tier_one_earnings.description: Here you can see the list of your Tier 1 referrals. For each member checking-in at the same time with you, you will both get extra 25% on your base current adoption earning rate.

ping.title: Ping Button
ping.description: Notify your referrals to start their check-in sessions. You can send one notification to each referral every 24h.

home.title: Home
home.description: Welcome to [[:ice]]. On the home screen you can find all the statistics about your balance, the current earning rate, your global rank along with your team.

invite.title: Invite
invite.description: For every person that you invite, you will both earn up to 25% on your base earning rate. The more people you invite, the more you will earn.

team.title: Team
team.description: [[:ice]] is better with friends. On this page you can see the status of your team members from both Tier 1 and Tier 2 levels. You can also ping them from here.

news.title: News
news.description: Stay up to date on all our news and polls. As we are a Decentralized Autonomous Organization, you will be able to vote here for the future features.

profile.title: Profile
profile.description: Customize your profile details and see all your achievements and badges that you have earned. Use the calculator from here, so you can estimate your earnings.

earningicestart.title: Earning Ice
earningicestart.description: You can start the [[:ice]] check-in session every 24 hours by tapping this button. Don‚Äôt forget to come back each day and start earning!

earningiceseemore.title: Earning Ice
earningiceseemore.description: Tap again and see more details about your current check-in session.

stats.title: Stats
stats.description: On the stats page you can see Total and Active users that checked-in each day along with Top countries and users.

help.title: Help
help.description: Do you have any questions? Check out our list of frequently asked questions. If you can't find what you're looking for, don't hesitate to reach out to us at hi@ice.io.

preStaking.title: Pre-Staking
preStaking.description: Maximize your returns by pre-staking your earning rewards. Select your allocation and staking period to receive a bonus on top of your earnings.

wallet.title: Wallet Card
wallet.description: You can find here your current [[:ice]] balance, together with the earning rate. The more referrals from your team are online, the higher the earning rate.

earning.title: Earning Card
earning.description: Stay up to date on your earning rate and bonuses! Here you can check out your current rate, our base rate, and bonus rates for various activities in the app.

engagement.title: Engagement Card
engagement.description: Keep track of your check-in sessions streak and days off! Check this section for more details about your consecutive check-in sessions and to see how many available days off you have.

profilecard.title: Profile Card
profilecard.description: You can keep track of your profile status by following this card. It displays your current global rank, together with your role, level and total referrals.

referralscard.title: Referral Card
referralscard.description: See the evolution of your referral stats for the previous 5 days for both Tier 1 and Tier 2 referrals by tapping this card.

adoptioncard.title: Adoption Card
adoptioncard.description: Based on the average of the last week total of active Snowmen, you can see the current [[:ice]] earning rate. The earning rate is halved when reached the next threshold.

nickname.title: Nickname
nickname.description: The nickname is what makes you unique. Your friends will need to use it in order to join your team. You can also use this shortcut to open your profile.

balancehistory.title: Balance History
balancehistory.description: You can find here your current [[:ice]] balance on local wallet and blockchain. The local wallet balance is updated every hour, while the blockchain balance is updated every 24 hours.

achievements.title: Achievements
achievements.description: Complete the tasks below and level up! Start your first check-in session now!

unlinkLogin.title: Unlink Login?
unlinkLogin.message: Are you sure you want to unlink the login via {{providerName}} from this device?

endSession.title: End Session?
endSession.message: Are you sure you want to end the {{providerName}} login session from this device?

extra_bonus.claim_message: It‚Äôs time for your today‚Äôs bonus, please tap on the [[:bold]]‚ÄúClaim Bonus‚Äù[[/:bold]] button bellow.
extra_bonus.extra_message: You have received your daily extra bonus on your earning rate.
extra_bonus.expired_message: Unfortunately, today's bonus has expired. Stay tuned for the next notification!

qr_code.description: Scan QR code to join my team.

tiktok.title: Join us on TikTok
tiktok.description: We just wanted to reach out and let you know about our exciting new community on TikTok. We're sharing fun and informative content about our digital currency, Ice, and we would love for you to join us!

youtube.title: Join us on YouTube
youtube.description: From tutorials on how to earn Ice, to updates about new features, and even fun community content, our YouTube channel is the perfect place to stay up-to-date.

linkedin.title: Join us on LinkedIn
linkedin.description: Joining the Ice community on LinkedIn is a great way to stay informed about the latest developments and to connect with like-minded individuals who are just as passionate about the future of digital currencies as you are.

facebook.title: Join us on Facebook
facebook.description_part1: We highly recommend giving our Facebook page a follow.
facebook.description_part2: Not only will it help you stay up to date on everything that‚Äôs happening with the Ice project, but it‚Äôs also a great way to connect with our community and be a part of the conversation.

instagram.title: Join us on Instagram
instagram.description_part1: Following us on Instagram is a great way to stay in the loop and connect with other users who are also passionate about Ice
instagram.description_part2: Plus, you'll be the first to know about any new features or promotions that we're launching.

reddit.title: Join us on Reddit
reddit.description:
Discover the Ice community on Reddit, where like-minded individuals come together to share their thoughts.

Join the conversation, ask questions, and explore engaging discussions about Ice mining, features, and more.

discord.title: Join us on Discord
discord.description:
Join our vibrant Discord community and dive into discussions and exclusive insights about Ice.

Dive into lively chats, stay informed about ice-related news, and be part of a community that shares your passion.

ice_founder_twitter.title: Follow Zeus on X
ice_founder_twitter.description: Follow Zeus, our visionary founder, on X, where he shares insights, updates, and thoughts on our mission. Join the conversation, ask questions, and stay connected with our inspiring leader as we embark on this exciting journey together.

ping_referrals_pop_up.title: Please wait while we ping all your friends ¬∑ {{count}}

creative_library.title: Creative Ice Library
creative_library.share: Build your dream team on Ice network!

get_started.subtitle: Get started on Ice and build your thriving micro-community
get_started.description: Join the fast-growing number of Ice users who are building their own micro-communities and earning more rewards. Our promotional tools, guides, and tips make it easy to spread the word and build a successful community.

01.title: Join
01.description:
Download our app, claim your nickname, and start mining.

You‚Äôll be joining a global community of users who are passionate about decentralization, autonomy, and the power of the people.

02.title: Invite
02.description:
Invite your audience to join Ice and work together to unlock additional rewards.

Plus, you‚Äôll be helping to spread the word about the benefits of decentralization and the future of finance.

03.title: Earn
03.description:
Grow your rewards by expanding your network and encouraging others to join the Ice community.

Join us in our mission to revolutionise the future of finance through decentralization and autonomy.

01.title: Videos
01.description: Use our collection of videos to promote your invitation code, landscape or portrait, with or without subtitles, we got you covered.

02.title: Images
02.description: A picture is worth a thousand words. You can choose from our collection of banners, social media assets, templates and app mockups.

03.title: Embedded Browser
03.description: With our embedded browser, you can easily promote Ice to your website visitors and invite them to join your mirco-community.

share.title: Share Your Story
share.description:
Share your journey with Ice network and its many benefits by writing an article in your language.

Share them on your Blog, Medium, Reddit, Quora, Blogger and more.

You can find everything about Ice and its unique features on our [[:link]]Knowledge Base[[/:link]], [[:link]]Homepage[[/:link]], and [[:link]]FAQ[[/:link]] page.

spread.title: Spread the Word
spread.description:
Join the conversation and introduce the Ice network to your favorite forums.
Start new threads and share your thoughts about decentralized finance, the future of currency, and the power of building a micro-community with Ice.

Be a ‚òÉÔ∏è Snowman and spark a discussion about the potential of this global currency.

bring.title: Bring Your Friends Onboard
bring.description: Use our easy-to-use invite feature and share your personal invitation code with your friends on your favorite social media platforms.

web.title: Plug & Play for Website Owners
web.description:
Embed Ice network directly onto your website with our simple and flexible JS banner. It‚Äôs a quick and easy setup that can be customized to match your website‚Äôs branding. It‚Äôs translated into 50 languages and is compatible with any website platform.

Copy and paste the code into your website, and start promoting Ice network to your visitors today.

mobile.title: Library for Mobile Apps
mobile.description:
Integrate our easy-to-use library into your mobile app and invite your users to join your micro-community and start mining.

With translation support and flexible setup options, you can ensure that all of your users have access to the same great Ice experience, no matter where they are in the world.

01.title: Be authentic
01.description: Write from your personal experience and perspective. Share your honest thoughts and feelings about Ice network.

02.title: Use a friendly tone
02.description: Write as if you are talking to a friend, and avoid using overly technical jargon or language that may be difficult for readers to understand.

03.title: Be creative
03.description: Don‚Äôt be afraid to experiment with different types of content, such as blog posts, videos, or social media updates. Have fun and be innovative in the way you promote Ice network to your audience.

01.title: Don‚Äôt spam
01.description: Avoid sending unsolicited messages or repeatedly posting the same content on different platforms. This can be seen as intrusive and annoying.

02.title: Don‚Äôt mislead people
02.description: The Ice project doesn‚Äôt pay users any cash, we only reward with Ice coins. Please avoid posting content such as ‚ÄúTurn your Ice into cash‚Äù. ‚ÄúHow to earn $100 with Ice‚Äù and so on.

03.title: Don‚Äôt engage in fraudulent activities
03.description: We value transparency and honesty in our community. Any fraudulent activities such as creating multiple accounts or trying to manipulate the Ice network will not be tolerated.

face_auth.title: KYC Step #1
face_auth.description:
For a seamless experience, we're adding face authentication. This step acts as your [[:bold]]early Step #1 KYC[[/:bold]], preparing you for a streamlined verification for the future Mainnet. 

Confirm your identity today to ensure a smooth journey ahead!
face_auth.consent: I agree with the Ice [[:link]]KYC Terms and Conditions[[/:link]].
face_auth.confirmation: I confirm that the identity I'm using for this authentication will be the same one associated with this account, and this choice cannot be changed later.

loading.description: Please wait while we authenticate you...

success.title: ‚úÖ Authentication Successful
success.description: Thank you for confirming your identity. Your check-in session will start now.

failure.title: ‚ùå Authentication Failed
failure.description: We couldn't verify your identity. Please ensure good lighting and that your face is fully visible, then try again.

try_later.title: ‚ùå Authentication Failed
try_later.description: We couldn't verify your identity. Please ensure good lighting and that your face is fully visible, then try again in 1 hour.

continue.title: üòÅ KYC Emotion Verification
continue.description: Great job! You've completed the first step by taking a selfie. Now, let's proceed by following the displayed emotions to continue your KYC process.

banned.title: ‚ùå Mining disabled
banned.description: We have identified that your identity is associated with another account. If you think this is an error, please send an email to [[:bold]]feedback@ice.io[[/:bold]] with your nickname and a high-quality selfie.

device_angle_warning.title: Warning
device_angle_warning.description: Please keep the phone straight while looking into camera

camera_permission.title: Camera permission
camera_permission.description: To continue, please allow access to camera.

selfie_guidelines.title: Selfie Guidelines
selfie_guidelines.instruction: Before proceeding, please follow these guidelines for a successful KYC face authentication:
selfie_guidelines.check_1: ‚úÖ Make sure you have a high-quality photo.
selfie_guidelines.warning: If you don't follow the guidelines above, you might lose access to your account.
selfie_guidelines.confirmation: I confirm that I will follow the criteria.
selfie_guidelines.popup_body: Do you confirm that you have followed all the selfie guidelines?

whoInvitedYou.description: Enter the nickname of the friend who invited you.
whoInvitedYou.dontHaveInvitationCode: Please make sure you enter the correct nickname.

claimUsername.description: Your friends will need to use this nickname when joining [[:ice]].

pioneer.description: Track your progress and global status

invite_friends.description: Grow your team and build a community

roadmap.button_subtitle: Learn more about our future vision at Ice.

join_mainnet.subtitle: Get a sneak peak of our future Mainnet app and its unique features, to be released at the end of 2024.

empty.team: You currently don't have any friends!

contacts.empty_description: Sync your contacts and see who is already on [[:ice]].

settings.invite_description: Grow your team with new members

profile.invite_friends_engage: Spread the word and invite your friends to join the Ice Network community!

invite.description: Use this feature to invite your friends to join the Ice community. Expand your network, share experiences, and build lasting connections together.

wallet.description: You can find here your current ice balance, together with the earning rate.

earning.description: Stay up to date on your earning rate and bonuses! Here you can check out your current rate, our base rate, and bonus rates.

referrals.description: In this section, you will see the total number of team members you have invited, allowing you to track your community‚Äôs growth and evolution.

earnings.description: Your current balance is updated every hour and displayed here. It includes your direct & staked earnings.

bsc_address.title: BNB Smart Chain address
bsc_address.enter_address_title:
Enter your
BNB Smart Chain address
bsc_address.enter_address_description: During Phase One, the ICE tokens will be released on the BNB Smart Chain blockchain. Once Mainnet has been launched, the tokens will be swappable from BNB Smart Chain to Ice Open Network (ION) blockchain.
bsc_address.enter_address_confirmation: Are you sure that the BNB Smart Chain address is correct?
bsc_address.validators_warning_text: Please note that individuals who have added a BNB Smart Chain address to their account are not eligible to become one of the top 300 validators as per our whitepaper for the mainnet launch.
bsc_address.walletDescription:
We advise using a self-custodial wallet such as [[:bold]]Metamask[[/:bold]] or [[:bold]]Trust Wallet[[/:bold]].

Please ensure that you double-check your wallet address to make sure you will receive the distribution.

select_method_step.title: KYC Step #2
select_method_step.description: Verify your account easily by using your existing X profile.

x.1: Open X and search for [[:bold]]@ice_blockchain[[/:bold]] account.
x.2: Find the pinned post, which is the first post on the profile.
x.3: ‚ù§Ô∏è Like & üîÑ Repost it with [[:bold]]Quote[[/:bold]] using the [[:bold]]EXACT[[/:bold]] text below.

pop_up.title: Confirmation
pop_up.description: Did you like the pinned post and repost it with a quote using the exact text provided, as in the example?

verification_step.title: Confirmation
verification_step.description: To complete your verification, please paste the link to the post where you completed the previous steps. Ensure the link is correct.

instructions_step.4: Paste the link of your post below. üëá

pop_up.title: Invalid Link

success.title: Verification Completed
success.description: Congratulations, you have successfully completed your KYC Step #2. You are now verified.

error_try_again.title: Verification Error
error_try_again.description: Please make sure that you have reposted the correct post, using the provided text, and that the post is publicly available.

error_try_later.title: Verification Error
error_try_later.description: We couldn't complete the verification. You can try again in 7 days.

select_method_step.title: BNB Smart Chain Distribution
select_method_step.description: Receive your BNB Smart Chain ICE coins by verifying your account easily using your existing X profile.

x.1: Tap the link [[:bold]]here[[/:bold]] to open our X post directly.

pop_up.description: Please follow the instructions and make sure that you tapped on the link in first step to open our X post.
pop_up.description2: Did you liked the correct post and reposted it with quote using the exact text provided, as in the example?

success.description: Congratulations, you have successfully completed your verification. You are now eligible for the BNB Smart Chain distribution.

account_confirmation.title: Account confirmation
account_confirmation.description: To verify your account identity and securely link your email, please ensure that you successfully pass our emotions check during the authentication process.
account_confirmation.description2: This step helps us ensure the security and authenticity of your account. Thank you for your cooperation!

quiz.title: Quiz

intro.description: At Ice, we believe in fostering a community of active and informed members. Our mission is to ensure that Ice coins are distributed to those who are genuinely engaged and aligned with our vision.

knowledge_check.title: üß† Knowledge Check
knowledge_check.description: To ensure our community is well-informed and aligned with our vision:
knowledge_check.point1: You'll be presented with 21 questions derived from our comprehensive resources.
knowledge_check.point2: To pass the quiz, you need to answer at least 18 questions correctly.
knowledge_check.point3: A failed quiz indicates a need for further engagement with our materials.
knowledge_check.point4: There is a date limit for passing the quiz. You can see how many days left you have until the expiration date on your homepage in the quiz section.
knowledge_check.point5: You have 3 retries available before the expiration date. If you fail the quiz 3 times or if the expiration date passes, you will not be able to mine anymore and your account will go into slashing.
knowledge_check.point6: üìö All info for this quiz can be read [[:link]]here[[/:link]].

why_quiz.title: üí° Why the Quiz?
why_quiz.description: Our commitment to knowledge and understanding is at the forefront of our community. With our quiz, we aim to ensure that Ice finds its way into the right hands, those who genuinely comprehend and align with our project's vision.

community_engagement.title: üôå Active Community Engagement
community_engagement.description: Your engagement within the Ice Ecosystem directly influences your mining capabilities:
community_engagement.point1: Stay Updated: Engage with our news articles and videos.
community_engagement.point2: Participate Actively: Join our Personal Development Program and live sessions on YouTube or Twitter Space.
community_engagement.point3: Social Interactions: Boost your presence by liking, sharing, following, or posting about Ice.
community_engagement.bottom_description: The more engaged you are, the higher your positive interaction score, enabling you to go through the KYC process.

intro.terms_privacy: I understand & I agree with the [[:link]]Terms and Conditions.[[/:link]]

quiz_failure.title: Failed Quiz
quiz_failure.description: You didn't answer more than 18 questions correctly or the time expired, so you can't pass the quiz.
quiz_failure.check_faq: In order to answer correctly next time, we suggest you familiarize yourself with our knowledge base and FAQ.

confirmation_popup.title: Confirmation
confirmation_popup.start_description: Are you sure you want to start the quiz?
confirmation_popup.cancel_description: By skipping the quiz, you will use one retry available. Are you sure you want to skip the quiz now?

quiz_success.title: Verification Completed
quiz_success.description: Congratulations, you have successfully completed your KYC. Your consistent correct answers have proven your dedication and knowledge. You are now verified.

mining_disabled_popup.title: ‚ùå Mining disabled
mining_disabled_popup.description: Your mining access has been disabled due to three consecutive quiz failures or the expiration of the allotted time, as required by our KYC process.

quiz.reminder: Please note that you need to complete the quiz in order to be eligible to continue mining and avoid slashing.

select_method_step.title: BNB Smart Chain Distribution
select_method_step.description: Maintain your monthly BNB Smart Chain ICE coins distribution eligibility by actively supporting the latest Exchange announcements on X.

success.description: Congratulations, you have successfully completed your verification. You are now eligible to maintain your monthly BNB Smart Chain distribution status.
